name: Water and Lava (Glaucidium Games)
description: After all, the most "out of control" things on Earth are natural elements, such as water and fire. In this game your task is to conquered as much territory as you can with element that you choose.  Take into consideration, that after each of your turn, the elements on map flow to the unpredicteble direction, so you just trying to control the things which are uncontrollable by their nature!
